entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
